function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adoption of pandemic-resistant urban design recommendations","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread in urban spaces","Mitigation":"Incorporate pandemic-resistant design recommendations into urban planning and architectural practices","Technologies":"Urban design software, 3D modeling tools, simulation and modeling software","People":"Urban planners, architects, developers, local authorities","Owner":"Urban planning and architectural professionals"},{"Description":"Failure of measures due to lack of consideration for cultural beliefs and practices","Impact":"Ineffective prevention of virus spread due to non-compliance with measures","Mitigation":"Conduct cultural and social impact assessments to tailor measures to local beliefs and practices","Technologies":"Cultural anthropology studies, social impact assessment tools","People":"Local communities, cultural experts, policymakers","Owner":"Local authorities, cultural experts"},{"Description":"Evolution of crisis leading to uncertain conclusions","Impact":"Difficulty in developing effective and conclusive strategies for pandemic mitigation","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of evolving crisis, adaptive planning, and flexible response strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, crisis management teams","Owner":"Public health agencies, crisis management teams"}]}
